TopicTitle: Burn start and end indicator lights are confusing

Articles.Content:
With a maneuver node created,  the "ready, set, go" indicator lights seem to flash at the one second mark instead of zero.   Do I burn when all three of the indicators flash or at zero seconds?

Also iterated elsewhere in the forums,  could you please update the remaining delta-v as we are executing the maneuver burn?  That info is useful when fine turning the burn and correcting when I overshoot the maneuver burn.

It was more or less working at patch 1, and now it barely makes any sense at patch 2. Additional bugs arrived as well on the same topic.

I wonder if they performed any tests before releasing the patch 2.

I think they have multiple, parallel branches getting worked on and they keep flip flopping stuff at us. 

That's why something that worked pre patch gets borkedup post, and why previously 'solved' problems return
